DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user sets a different theme
NAME: Review prompt Appearance trigger @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Privacy settings screen layout matches the expected baseline
NAME: Check Privacy settings layout @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that joining a community works and the conversation syncs to a linked device
NAME: Join community test @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that an emoji reaction can be sent and is received in a 1-1 conversation.
NAME: Send emoji react 1:1 @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a voice message can be sent to a group, all members receive the document, and replying to a document works as expected
NAME: Send voice message to group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION:
Verifies that an admin can delete a group successfully via the UI.
  The group members see the empty state control message, and the admin's conversation disappears from the home screen, even on a linked device.
NAME: Delete group linked device @ios @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that global deletion in a group deletes a message for every participant.
NAME: Delete message for all in group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies message length behavior at 1799 characters - no countdown shows, message sends
NAME: Message length limit (1799 chars) @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that 'Disappear After Send' works as expected in a 1:1 conversation
NAME: Disappear after send @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that when a message is deleted on one device, it shows as deleted on a linked device too.
NAME: Delete message linked device @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION:
Verifies voice call functionality and permission flow:
    - Verifies strings of all call permission prompts (microphone, notifications, etc.)
    - Verifies missed call notifications when recipient lacks permissions
    - Confirms successful call connection once both users enable permissions
    - Verifies control messages after call is finished
    Note that due to the nature of virtual devices, no actual "talking" takes place
NAME: Voice calls @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Create four accounts, create a group with three, add the fourth member
NAME: Add contact to group @ios @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user visits the Path screen in Settings
NAME: Review prompt Path trigger @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Mocks a custom install date 7 days 2 minutes ago, opens the app, and verifies that the Donate CTA is shown.
NAME: Donate CTA shows if app installed >=7 days ago @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that ONS resolution works
NAME: ONS resolution @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a group of 3 can be created successfully via the UI
NAME: Create group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies message length behavior at 2000 characters - countdown shows 0, message sends
NAME: Message length limit (2000 chars) @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a blocked user syncs to a linked device
NAME: Block user linked device @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that local deletion in a group does not delete a message for other participants.
NAME: Delete message locally in group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Settings page screen layout matches the expected baseline
NAME: Check Settings page layout @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that restoring an account works as expected: Display Name and Account ID match, no Recovery password banner on home screen.
NAME: Link device @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies message length behavior at 2001 characters - countdown shows -1, cannot send message
NAME: Message length limit (2001 chars) @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the in-app review prompt shows after the user presses the Donate button in Settings
NAME: Review prompt Donate trigger @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Notifications settings screen layout matches the expected baseline
NAME: Check Notifications settings layout @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies the in-app review modal texts and buttons for the negative flow (Enjoying Session - Give Feedback - Open URL)
NAME: Review prompt negative flow @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies message length behavior at 1800 characters - countdown shows 200, message sends
NAME: Message length limit (1800 chars) @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a link with preview can be sent to a group, all members receive the document, and replying to a document works as expected
NAME: Send link to group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Donate CTA is shown after dismissing the positive review prompt; verifies modal strings and screenshot; and that the Donate button shows the correct Open URL modal.
NAME: Donate CTA shows after positive review @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that an emoji reaction can be sent and is received in a group.
NAME: Send emoji react groups @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a user can be blocked from the conversation settings
NAME: Block user in conversation settings @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Conversations settings screen layout matches the expected baseline
NAME: Check Conversations settings layout @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that 'Disappear After Read' can be set in a 1:1 conversation, and that a message disappears after the specified expiry time.
NAME: Disappear after read @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that message bubbles appear as expected (oneline and multiline messages, reply layout, outgoing/incoming)
NAME: Check message bubble layout @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Mocks a custom install date 6 days, 23 hours, and 58 minutes ago, opens the app, and verifies that the Donate CTA does not show.
NAME: Donate CTA does not show if app installed <7 days ago @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that leaving a group syncs to a linked device
NAME: Leave group linked device @ios @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that Disappearing Messages can be set in a group conversation, and that a message disappears after the specified expiry time.
NAME: Disappear after send groups @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a non-admin member can leave a group successfully via the UI
NAME: Leave group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a user can set a nickname for a contact and that it appears correctly in the conversation settings, conversation header and home screen.
NAME: Set nickname @ios @high-risk @2-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a group (and its messages) created on one device appears when restoring on a second device.
NAME: Restore group @ios @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that an image can be sent to a group, all members receive the document, and replying to a document works as expected
NAME: Send image to group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that turning off Disappearing Messages works as expected in a 1:1 conversation
NAME: Disappear after send off 1:1 @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a PDF can be sent to a group, all members receive the document, and replying to a document works as expected
NAME: Send document to group @ios @high-risk @3-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Appearance settings screen layout matches the expected baseline
NAME: Check Appearance settings layout @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that a group created on one device appears on a linked device, and that a group name change syncs to all members.
NAME: Create group and change name syncs @ios @high-risk @4-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies that the Settings donation link is correct and that the HTTP request is successful (200)
NAME: Donate Settings menu item @ios @high-risk @1-devices

DESCRIPTION: Verifies the in-app review modal texts and buttons for the positive flow (Enjoying Session - Rate App)
NAME: Review prompt positive flow @ios @high-risk @1-devices
